structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
A ORGANIZATION OF GOVERNMENT IN CITIES

law.catch_line: Laws governing election of city officers and dates for primary and regular elections.

text.section: Election of city officers shall be governed by the provisions of KRS Chapters 116 to 121, except as provided in this chapter.
Dates on which primary and regular elections are to be held shall be governed by the provisions of KRS 118.025, except as provided in this chapter.

law.history: Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 17, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1988.
